designVariations.name: Industrial Confidence
designVariations.rationale: This design reflects the industrial nature of plumbing work with bold typography and navy-orange combination that conveys reliability and expertise. The strong geometric elements mirror the precision required in Ryan's plumbing and gas fitting services across Northern NSW's diverse residential and industrial sectors.

layout.hero: Split layout with large typography on left and industrial imagery on right
layout.sections: Grid-based arrangement with alternating content blocks and service highlights
layout.cards: Sharp-edged cards with bold orange accent borders and geometric icons

designVariations.recommendationReason: Best captures the trades industry aesthetic while maintaining approachability for residential customers, with the navy-orange palette conveying both trustworthiness and energy that suits a growing plumbing business

designVariations.name: Northern Utility
designVariations.rationale: Inspired by Northern NSW's natural landscape, this design uses forest green and yellow to create an approachable yet professional presence. The clean typography and organic elements reflect Ryan McArthur Plumbing's versatility in serving both residential homes and mobile living spaces.

layout.hero: Full-width background with centered text overlay and subtle geometric framing
layout.sections: Card-focused layout with staggered arrangement and nature-inspired spacing
layout.cards: Rounded corners with subtle shadows and yellow accent highlights on hover

designVariations.name: Precision Engineering
designVariations.rationale: This design emphasizes the technical expertise required in gas fitting and plumbing with a sleek charcoal and teal combination. The modern typography and high-contrast elements reflect the precision and safety standards essential to Ryan's LPG and general plumbing services.

layout.hero: Minimal centered design with large typography and subtle geometric background patterns
layout.sections: Clean alternating sections with generous whitespace and technical iconography
layout.cards: Minimal bordered cards with teal accent lines and crisp typography

designVariations.name: Outback Trades
designVariations.rationale: Drawing from Australia's rugged landscape, this design uses warm earth tones and bold typography to convey strength and dependability. The textured elements and robust styling reflect the durability needed for plumbing services across Northern NSW's varied terrain and climate conditions.

layout.hero: Layered design with textured background, bold headlines, and overlapping content blocks
layout.sections: Robust grid layout with textured dividers and industrial-style spacing
layout.cards: Heavy shadowed cards with textured backgrounds and orange accent elements

stories.title: Project setup: Next.js + Tailwind, Cloudflare config

acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14+ project initialized with TypeScript and App Router
Tailwind CSS configured and working
npm run build succeeds without errors
next.config.js configured for static export (output: 'export')

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with business name, tagline, and hero image from assets/images/

Trust signals section (reviews, certifications, experience)
Clear call-to-action buttons
Uses images from assets/images/ folder (NOT placeholder images)
